com.practo.wp.controllers

Class TripController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.practo.wp.controllers.TripController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/trip")
public class TripController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for getting listing of all the trips, listig based on user, deletion and editing of the trip by user who has posted it.
    Author:
    ankit
